title: Iceye to provide SAR satellite capability to Ukraine under charity contract
key_assets: full capability of one synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellite
access to other satellites in Iceye’s constellation
frequently updated satellite imagery on critical locations
summary: Iceye announced an agreement with the Serhiy Prytula Charity Foundation to transfer the full capability of one SAR satellite and access to its constellation to the Ukrainian government. The service will provide frequently updated satellite imagery to the Ukrainian Armed Forces, with delivery expected in the coming weeks.
why_it_matters: This contract represents a significant step in providing Ukraine with critical Earth observation data to support its defense efforts amid the ongoing war. It also highlights Iceye’s role in delivering SAR technology for sovereign and strategic applications.
